title: Goodbye Eurosport: Live Cycling in UK and Ireland Will Cost £30.99 a Month on TNT Sports
content:
Eurosport will cease operations in the UK and Ireland from February 28, 2025, when cycling coverage will be folded into TNT Sports.

Read the full article at Goodbye Eurosport: Live Cycling in UK and Ireland Will Cost £30.99 a Month on TNT Sports on Velo.
author: ahood
